greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = phi(n)*d(n) - n.
reference: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, p. 10.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[EulerPhi[n]*DivisorSigma[0, n] - n, {n, 1, 80}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 14 2019 *)
program: (PARI) vector(80, n, eulerphi(n)*sigma(n,0) - n) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 14 2019
(MAGMA) [EulerPhi(n)*DivisorSigma(0,n) - n: n in [1..80]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 14 2019
(Sage) [euler_phi(n)*sigma(n, 0) - n for n in (1..80)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 14 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 23 2003
